headline: Micron’s US$24b Singapore Fab Deepens AI Memory Growth Story
summary: Micron Technology (NasdaqGS:MU) has started building a US$24b advanced wafer fabrication plant in Singapore. The facility is designed to scale production of NAND and high bandwidth memory used in AI and data intensive workloads. Micron plans to co locate R&D and smart manufacturing capabilities at the site to support long term product development. For you as an investor, this project highlights how Micron is positioning itself within the global memory supply chain tied to AI and data...

headline: UBS Raises Micron Technology (MU) Price Target to $450
summary: Micron Technology Inc. (NASDAQ:MU) is one of the worst AI stocks to invest in according to Reddit.
